code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import ClipLoader from'react-spinners/ClipLoader';import{Link,useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'./axiosConfig';import StarRatings from'react-star-ratings';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserBooks=_ref=>{let{userBooks,onRemoveFromMyList,ratings,updateRating}=_ref;const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const history=useHistory();useEffect(()=>{if(userBooks){setLoading(false);}},[userBooks]);const handleStarClick=async(nextValue,bookId)=>{updateRating(bookId,nextValue);const token=localStorage.getItem('token');try{await axios.patch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/user/books/").concat(bookId),{rating:nextValue},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});}catch(error){console.error('Error updating rating:',error);}};const handleAddReview=bookId=>{history.push("/books/".concat(bookId));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-books-container",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClipLoader,{size:50,color:"#007bff"}):userBooks.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"empty-list-message",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Your book list is currently empty.
